comment: A filter converges to a point iff every finer filter clusters there. Along with ~ fclsfnflim , this theorem illustrates the duality between convergence and clustering. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 12-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Aug-2015.)
